faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quickly find answers to the most common questions about our travel services.

booking.title: How to book a trip on Itineria?
booking.answer: Booking a trip on Itineria is simple and fast. You can use our search engine at the top of the page to compare prices for flights, hotels and activities. Once you've made your selection, follow the online booking steps or contact us directly for personalized assistance.

payment.title: What payment methods are accepted?
payment.answer: We accept all common payment methods: credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), bank transfers, checks and installment payments for certain trips. All our transactions are secured by the latest encryption technologies.

insurance.title: Do you offer travel insurance?
insurance.answer: Yes, we offer several travel insurance packages tailored to your needs. Our insurance covers cancellation, medical expenses, luggage and delays. Our advisors can help you choose the package best suited to your destination and budget.

cancellation.title: What to do in case of cancellation or modification?
cancellation.answer: In case of cancellation or modification, contact us immediately. Conditions vary depending on providers and chosen rates. We will assist you with the procedures and inform you of any fees. We strongly recommend taking out cancellation insurance to protect yourself.

custom.title: Do you offer custom trips?
custom.answer: Absolutely! Our travel experts create personalized itineraries based on your desires, budget and constraints. Whether it's for a family trip, romantic getaway or solo adventure, we design unique trips that perfectly match your expectations.
